Basic Life Support for HealthCare Providers

I do not own any of the content in this app. All pages and information is taken from https://www.sja.ca/English/Courses-and-Training/Pages/firstaidbook.aspx. If you enjoy this material, please consider taking a Standard First Aid Course. 

This app is meant for people who are interested in learning a bit about first aid and can never replace the knowledge gained from a practical first aid course. The information from this app should not empower any individual to perform any first aid they are not certified for. 

If you have any comments or suggestions, please leave a comment and I will do my best to improve the app.
